general.title: General Information
general.content: Bill Gates is an American business magnate, software developer, and philanthropist. He co-founded Microsoft Corporation in 1975 along with Paul Allen. Bill Gates is one of the pioneers of the personal computer revolution and played a pivotal role in the development of the software industry.

history.description: Co-founded Microsoft Corporation and led the company as Chairman. Contributed to the development of various software products and played a key role in the growth of the company.
Co-chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, one of the largest philanthropic organizations in the world. Focused on global health, education, and poverty alleviation.
